summary: Undeclared namespace in the XML representation of a Maven project

comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Examine closure-compiler.pom What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The default namespace as well as the namespace with the xsi prefix should be defined. It is not so. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Revision 1975. Ubuntu 12.04. Please provide any additional information below. See http://maven.apache.org/pom.html#Quick_Overview
This issue was closed by revision r1978.
